title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 348.1 - Fraud defined
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 348.1 - Fraud defined

State Regulations

For the purposes of section
145
of the

Social Services Law and the regulations herein, fraud shall be deemed to exist
when a person knowingly obtains, or attempts to obtain, or aids or abets
another person to obtain, public assistance or care to which he is not entitled
by means of a false statement, deliberate concealment of a material fact or
other dishonest act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
348.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
